# OGP - Network Protocol Prototype

This is a C++ project for experimenting with a novel network protocol.

## Build System
This project uses Bazel as the build system.

## Compiler Requirements
This project requires Clang as the C++ compiler. Do not use GCC or MSVC.

## Development Guidelines
- Follow modern C++ practices (C++17 or later)
- Use Clang as the C++ compiler
- Keep protocol definitions separate from implementation
- Document all protocol design decisions in `/docs/plans`
